message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.PL

The paper proposes an algorithm for automatically learning a model of a reactive system, which can be used for formal model verification. This involves probabilistic and nondeterministic transitions, and the learned model is a labeled Markov decision process. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper focuses on a learning algorithm. The paper also involves aspects of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), as it deals with automated learning of system models. Additionally, the paper involves aspects of Software Engineering (cs.SE), as it deals with formal model verification. The paper also involves aspects of Cryptography and Security (cs.CR), as it deals with analyzing the probabilistic linear temporal logic properties of the system. Finally, the paper involves aspects of Programming Languages (cs.PL), as it deals with learning a model of a reactive system in the form of a labeled Markov decision process.
